job description:
We are currently seeking a motivated, career and customer oriented Airlift Data Analyst to join our team in Scott Air Force Base, IL, to begin an exciting and challenging career with Unisys Federal Systems.

In this role you will compile, analyze and report air transportation movement data for the 618 Air Operations Center (AOC) Stratgy Division.
Duties/Tasks and Responsibilities:
  • Compares manifest information to planned data and populates spreadsheets and power point presentations with relevant movement data.
  • Utilizes the Global Air Transportation Execution System (GATES), the Global Transportation Network (GTN), a locally developed Fusilator program, and a variety of other tools and systems to determine passengers and cargo moving in support of the Department of Defense mission.
  • Evaluates system discrepancies and solves unique transportation movement issues in respect to in-transit visibility of passengers and cargo moving within the Department of Defense transportation system.
  • Develops briefings and presents data to senior level decision makers for efficient and effective use of airlift assets, both military and commercial.
  • Utilizes database tools to compile historical information relating to the movement of unclassified and classified force movement.
  • Provides transportation consultant services to executive level decision makers.
  • Develops and presents executive level DTTS presentations for dignitaries and high level DoD personnel from all Services.
  • Work 40 hour week with split weekend and holiday as per the schedule.
  • Update and import data (JOPES/SMS) for the Web Robin, and create deliverables.
  • Record each action/activity in a provided Shift Tool
  • Maintain NIPR/SIPR accounts and monitor email on both systems throughout the assigned shift.
  • Interface with other internal directorates to obtain data needed for product updates
Requirements

Position Requirements:
U.S. CITIZENSHIP REQUIRED
Active SECRET Security Clearance
Education/Experience: Bachelor's degree or a minimum of 5 years of relevant work experience (Air Refueling and Airlift Operations).
  • Shift will be (15:00pm to 23:00pm) holidays on days other than actual holiday
